Title: Relates to establishing requirements for residential healthcare facilities during a state disaster emergency involving a disease outbreak
Summary: Relates to establishing requirements for residential health care facilities during a state disaster emergency involving a disease outbreak; requires the department of health to issue guidance regarding precautions and procedures to maintain health and safety; establishes residential healthcare facility reporting requirements.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803, add ยง2808-e, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing requirements for residential healthcare facilities during a state disaster emergency involving a disease outbreak
